titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-455, by Mr. Dreier.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 164.

bill.summary: Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII with respect to a reported resolution providing for consideration or disposition of H.R. 3550 (authorizing funds for Federal-aid highways, highway safety programs, and transit programs).
